title: Illithid Powers
content:
quired from Manip Edenosa in Bloomridge Park. One can be found in the basement of the Blushing Mermaid. (X-2336, Y-120) One can be found in a locked chest in Gortash's office, on the roof of Wyrm's Rock Fortress.

One additional one can be found on the body of Churg Elvek, who is preaching next to this ship.
